text: The COVID-19 pandemic was confirmed to have reached Burundi in March 2020. Burundi's Health Minister Thad√©e Ndikumana confirmed the country's first two cases of coronavirus disease 2019 on 31 March, Burundi nationals travelling back from Rwanda and Dubai. On 2 April, a further positive case was confirmed, a 26-year-old woman, while 22 other people tested negative. ==References== Category:Burundi Burundi
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Burundi
